subject: Test fails when run alone but passes when run together with others!
msgSnippet: Hi all, I have a TestCase for which one of its tests fails when the TestCase is run alone but passes when the test is run together with other TestCases (in my
messageBody:
Hi all,

I have a TestCase for which one of its tests fails when the TestCase is run
alone but passes when the test is run together with other TestCases (in my
AllTests).

I was under the impression that JUnit tests ran very independently so that
something like this could never happen. What could I be doing wrong? Where
should I look? Any tips.

If this questions been up several times just give me a tip on what to look
for in the archive.

Thanks in advance.

Morten
